text_1: We want to thank you for being a loyal %ISP_TEXT% user! Your IP address has been randomly selected for a chance to enter a contest and potentially win a %DEVICE_TEXT%.
text_2: From time to time, we select a handful of %ISP_TEXT% users to give them the opportunity to enter into exclusive contests and potentially win valuable gifts from our partners and sponsors. This is our way of thanking you for choosing %ISP_TEXT% as your preferred service.
text_3: Today is your lucky day! You are one of the 10 randomly selected users who may enter a contest for a chance to win a %DEVICE_TEXT%.
text_4: To receive your gift, you simply have to complete our short and anonymous survey. But hurry! There are only a few gifts available today!
what_do_you_like_the_most_text: What do you like the most about %ISP_TEXT%?
Congratulations_select_the_gift_text: Congratulations! Select the gift you may win:
Due_to_limited_availability_text: Due to limited availability your place in the contest will be reserved for you for the next 2:44 minutes.
If_you_do_not_claim_text: If you do not claim your place in the contest during this time it will be given to the next happy %ISP_TEXT% user.
What_you_pay_to_enter_the_contest: What you pay to enter the contest
